articles.title: Marat Khusnutdinov scores in OT, Morgan Geekie has goal in 6th straight as Bruins beat Sabres 4-3
articles.description:
Joonas Korpisalo made 37 saves as the Bruins won for the third time in four games.

The post Marat Khusnutdinov scores in OT, Morgan Geekie has goal in 6th straight as Bruins beat Sabres 4-3 appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins defeat Sabres 4-3 in overtime on October 30, 2025.
Marat Khusnutdinov scored the winning goal; Morgan Geekie extended his scoring streak to six games.
Joonas Korpisalo's 37 saves helped Bruins secure their third win in four games.

articles.title: Brookline farm starts free farmers market as Mass. residents brace for SNAP shutdown
articles.description:
The farmers market will be open on the first three Thursdays in November at the Loring Greenough House in Jamaica Plain.

The post Brookline farm starts free farmers market as Mass. residents brace for SNAP shutdown appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Brookline farm launches free farmers market to support local residents amid SNAP shutdown.
Market operates on November 2, 9, and 16 at Loring Greenough House in Jamaica Plain.
Initiative aims to alleviate food insecurity for Boston families facing financial challenges.

articles.title: Dictionary.com’s word of the year is ‘6-7.’ But is it even a word and what does it mean?
articles.description:
“Don’t worry, because we’re all still trying to figure out exactly what it means," the site said in its announcement this week.

The post Dictionary.com’s word of the year is ‘6-7.’ But is it even a word and what does it mean? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Dictionary.com named '6-7' as the word of the year for 2023.
The announcement was made this week, sparking local discussions on language.
Boston residents are questioning the meaning and relevance of this unconventional choice.
